thread.title: Rinne shuts down Oilers as Predators roll
thread.title_full: Rinne shuts down Oilers as Predators roll

title: Rinne shuts down Oilers as Predators roll
text: Rinne shuts down Oilers as Predators roll OCT 10, 11:40 pm Pekka Rinne made 31 saves in his 382nd career game -- tying the franchise record of Tomas Vokoun's record for appearances by a goaltender -- as the Predators sank the Oilers 2-0. Vladimir Putin celebrates birthday by scoring seven goals in hockey game 0 Comments You may use your Facebook account to add a comment on FoxSports.com , subject to Facebook's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy .
